Title: Verify sensitive data not hardcoded
Description: Verify that sensitive data is not hardcoded in application code
TestSteps: 1. Decompile/inspect application; 2. Search for hardcoded secrets; 3. Review source code

Title: Verify proper use of keystore
Description: Verify that Keystore/KeyChain is used for sensitive data
TestSteps: 1. Test data storage; 2. Verify encryption at rest; 3. Check Keystore usage

Title: Verify no sensitive data in logs
Description: Verify that no sensitive data is logged
TestSteps: 1. Monitor logs; 2. Search for sensitive info; 3. Check logging configuration

Title: Verify no sensitive data in UI
Description: Verify that sensitive data is not visible in UI elements
TestSteps: 1. Inspect UI elements; 2. Test keyboard caches; 3. Check autocomplete

Title: Verify biometric authentication
Description: Verify proper implementation of biometric authentication
TestSteps: 1. Test biometric flow; 2. Check for bypasses; 3. Verify fallback

Title: Verify secure authentication implementation
Description: Verify that authentication is securely implemented
TestSteps: 1. Test authentication flow; 2. Check for bypasses; 3. Verify tokens

Title: Verify session management
Description: Verify that sessions are properly managed
TestSteps: 1. Capture session tokens; 2. Test token handling; 3. Verify expiration

Title: Verify TLS in transit
Description: Verify that all network communication uses TLS
TestSteps: 1. Intercept traffic; 2. Check TLS version; 3. Verify certificate pinning

Title: Verify certificate pinning
Description: Verify that certificate pinning is implemented
TestSteps: 1. Test certificate pinning; 2. Try MITM attack; 3. Check implementation

Title: Verify no insecure protocols
Description: Verify that insecure protocols are not used
TestSteps: 1. Monitor network traffic; 2. Check protocol usage; 3. Verify encryption

Title: Verify cryptographic algorithms
Description: Verify that only strong cryptographic algorithms are used
TestSteps: 1. Identify crypto usage; 2. Check algorithm strength; 3. Verify key length

Title: Verify random number generation
Description: Verify that cryptographic RNG is used
TestSteps: 1. Test RNG usage; 2. Check entropy; 3. Verify seed

Title: Verify WebView security
Description: Verify that WebViews are securely configured
TestSteps: 1. Test WebView; 2. Check for XSS; 3. Verify file access

Title: Verify intent security
Description: Verify that Intents are securely handled
TestSteps: 1. Test Intent handling; 2. Check for path traversal; 3. Verify permissions

Title: Verify permission model
Description: Verify that app permissions are properly requested and enforced
TestSteps: 1. Review permissions; 2. Test permission enforcement; 3. Check runtime permissions

Title: Verify anti-debugging mechanisms
Description: Verify that anti-debugging protections are in place
TestSteps: 1. Test debugger attachment; 2. Check for anti-debug code; 3. Verify protection

Title: Verify jailbreak/root detection
Description: Verify that jailbreak/root detection is implemented
TestSteps: 1. Test on jailbroken device; 2. Check detection methods; 3. Verify response

Title: Verify code obfuscation
Description: Verify that code is obfuscated to prevent reverse engineering
TestSteps: 1. Decompile app; 2. Check for obfuscation; 3. Verify readability

Title: Verify integrity monitoring
Description: Verify that code integrity is monitored
TestSteps: 1. Check integrity checks; 2. Test tampering; 3. Verify response

Title: Verify privacy controls
Description: Verify that privacy controls are implemented
TestSteps: 1. Review privacy policy; 2. Test data collection; 3. Check permissions
